channel.title: Mike Lake
channel.description: Recent news about Mike Lake, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: With 2 days to Autism Walk, Jaden is at $8,375 raised, about $2,600 out of 2nd place! Please help him out here: http://t.co/53irleSRWZ #yeg

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Today, the World Economic Forum ranked Canada's financial system as the safest and soundest in the world for the sixth year in a row! #yeg

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: For Twitter friends contributing to Jaden's Autism Walk, please add your Twitter name to comment line so I can make the connection. :-)

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Thanks for the encouragement. ;-) @curmudgeonAB2: @MikeLakeMP maybe he should get his parents to teach him about realistic goals

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Jaden now at $4,295 for his Autism Walk, 43% of way to goal of $10,000. Please help him out today! http://t.co/53irleSRWZ Thank you! #yeg

item.title: Mentioned by Globe and Mail
item.description:
Redrawn Alberta ridings could lead to Tory showdowns
... range of parties, MPs over robo-calls · Trudeau's Liberals lead Tories by seven points in polls · Conservative MPs object to new Saskatchewan ridings, but is it too late? Conservative MP Mike Lake delivers a statement in the House of Commons last March.
